TopicTitle: What data you got? And what data we want you to get.

Articles.Content:
I suggest that we can see what data we have and how much... Like: You got: [100% Kerbin dirt] and/or [66% Kerbin mud]

(You did no send 100% the data ether because you did not have enough electricity or something happened to your ship.)

And i'd also like to see missions witch say: Get a sample of the Mun or Go to the other side of Kerbin and get some mud.

(Or some specific region on Kerbin.) When you do a mission it could give a 2%+ science or something.

Also sorry if something like this has already been suggested.

( This is another reason for not getting 100% data... I do not know what determines the %...)

Every time you send 100% you can send 100% more (like a part 2) but you will not get as many points.

(Don't know if there should be a Part 2 for the same data or you just get more % like 200%... Of course there will be a cap... Like 1500% or 15 parts.)

Edited October 26, 2013 by jacobmix
